argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsplit.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsplit.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsplit.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsplit.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsumsplit.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsumsplit.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumsplit.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 8 |  | gsumsplit.i | |- ( ph -> ( C i^i D ) = (/) ) |
| 9 |  | gsumsplit.u | |- ( ph -> A = ( C u. D ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 1, 10, 4, 6 | #P_cntzcmnf | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 10, 12, 5, 6, 13, 7, 8, 9 | #P_gsumzsplit | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( ( G gsum ( F |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( F |` D ) ) ) ) |
